bug.author: Echo9573
bug.summary: An bug reported when the objective="binary:logistic" in xgboost
bug.description: When using xgboost for binary classification, set in the with parameter: when objective is "binary: logistic", an error will be reported as following: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/70519454-ea58cb00-1b76-11ea-8ac0-63657ede14ae.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Echo9573>@Echo9573</denchmark-link> , could you also post the example SQL so that we can try to reproduce it?

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tonyyang-svail>@tonyyang-svail</denchmark-link> , you can reproduce this in this way: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24820352/71430684-40497900-2708-11ea-8f4e-1953ad8ec741.png></denchmark-link>
Ah, it should be "binary" instead of "binaray". :) I will add a field checker that produces more meaningful messages on errors like this.
